s0561.chinese: 楚懷王走之趙，趙不受，還之秦，即死，歸葬。
s0561.literal: Chu King Huai fled to Zhao, Zhao would not accept, returned to Qin, immediately died, returned for burial.
s0561.idiomatic: Chu King Huai fled to Zhao, Zhao would not accept, returned to Qin, immediately died, returned for burial.

s0562.chinese: 十二年，樓緩免，穰侯魏冉為相。
s0562.literal: Twelfth year, Lou Huan dismissed, Lord Rang Wei Ran became chancellor.
s0562.idiomatic: Twelfth year, Lou Huan dismissed, Lord Rang Wei Ran became chancellor.

s0564.chinese: 十三年，向壽伐韓，取武始。
s0564.literal: Thirteenth year, Xiang Shou attacked Han, took Wushi.
s0564.idiomatic: Thirteenth year, Xiang Shou attacked Han, took Wushi.

s0565.literal: Left Minister Bai Qi attacked Xincheng.
s0565.idiomatic: Left Minister Bai Qi attacked Xincheng.

s0566.literal: Grand Master of the Fifth Rank Li fled to Wei.
s0566.idiomatic: Grand Master of the Fifth Rank Li fled to Wei.

s0567.literal: Ren Bi became governor of Hanzhong.
s0567.idiomatic: Ren Bi became governor of Hanzhong.

s0568.chinese: 十四年，左更白起攻韓、魏於伊闕，斬首二十四萬，虜公孫喜，拔五城。
s0568.literal: Fourteenth year, Left Minister Bai Qi attacked Han and Wei at Yique, beheaded 240,000, captured Gongsun Xi, took five cities.
s0568.idiomatic: Fourteenth year, Left Minister Bai Qi attacked Han and Wei at Yique, beheaded 240,000, captured Gongsun Xi, took five cities.

s0569.chinese: 十五年，大良造白起攻魏，取垣，復予之。
s0569.literal: Fifteenth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Wei, took Yuan, then returned it.
s0569.idiomatic: Fifteenth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Wei, took Yuan, then returned it.

s0571.chinese: 十六年，左更錯取軹及鄧。
s0571.literal: Sixteenth year, Left Minister Cuo took Zhi and Deng.
s0571.idiomatic: Sixteenth year, Left Minister Cuo took Zhi and Deng.

s0572.chinese: 冉免，封公子市宛，公子悝鄧，魏冉陶，為諸侯。
s0572.literal: Ran dismissed, enfeoffed Prince Shi at Wan, Prince Kui at Deng, Wei Ran at Tao, as lords.
s0572.idiomatic: Ran dismissed, enfeoffed Prince Shi at Wan, Prince Kui at Deng, Wei Ran at Tao, as lords.

s0573.chinese: 十七年，城陽君入朝，及東周君來朝。
s0573.literal: Seventeenth year, Lord of Chengyang entered court, and Lord of Eastern Zhou came to court.
s0573.idiomatic: Seventeenth year, Lord of Chengyang entered court, and Lord of Eastern Zhou came to court.

s0574.literal: Qin renamed Yuan as Puban and Pishi.
s0574.idiomatic: Qin renamed Yuan as Puban and Pishi.

s0576.chinese: 十八年，錯攻垣、河雍，決橋取之。
s0576.literal: Eighteenth year, Cuo attacked Yuan and Heyong, broke the bridge and took them.
s0576.idiomatic: Eighteenth year, Cuo attacked Yuan and Heyong, broke the bridge and took them.

s0577.chinese: 十九年，王為西帝，齊為東帝，皆復去之。
s0577.literal: Nineteenth year, king became Western Emperor, Qi became Eastern Emperor, both later abandoned it.
s0577.idiomatic: Nineteenth year, king became Western Emperor, Qi became Eastern Emperor, both later abandoned it.

s0578.literal: Lu Li came from Wei to surrender.
s0578.idiomatic: Lu Li came from Wei to surrender.

s0579.literal: Qi destroyed Song, Song king was in Wei, died at Wen.
s0579.idiomatic: Qi destroyed Song, Song king was in Wei, died at Wen.
